He then asks how things are at home and how his dad's holding up, to which she says that he's his usual self, "lethargic as ever..." and "Goes around like an empty husk..." Riho then tells Masaru not to worry and that she'd stay up til he comes home and to take care on his way back(this is the next to last page where she's staring down the FIL while he's cumming). Last page, Riho asks if he's satisfied while stating again that she just wants to get it over quickly and that she has no feelings for him at all. FIL says "I see..." and walks away dejected. Riho's thoughts are that this whole thing is nothing more than care-giving and she's just keeping her pitiful father-in-law entertained and that there's no chance anything like that could lead to feelings of passion.

This leads to the present and the kitchen blowjob and later on, them fucking in the bedroom(which Riho hates because it's a pain to clean up). Riho tells him that she feels nothing after he says that her pussy probably feels neglected since she only used her mouth in the kitchen. He gets cocky and talks about breaking her stubborness while she thinks he's the only that's being stubborn. After he creampied her, it's shown that Masaru's called twice. FIL starts trying to get Riho to admit that she's enjoying sex with him and she says she's just exhausted and wants him to hurry up. He basically calls her a liar and then Masaru calls again and she actually answers to FIL's surprise. Masaru's still at the drinking party, but he should be able to catch the last train...

Since no English version will ever be posted, here's a quick summary: Riho and Masaru took in his recently-widowed dad 6 months ago. Three months in, Riho walked in on FIL sniffing her panties and he proceeds to rape her. She doesn't tell Masaru because she doesn't know how he'd react, so the FIL took this as his cue to keep on doing it. So, whenever he starts raping her, Riho just basically shut off her mind and lets him have his way so that it can be over quicker. She figures that he'll get bored if she takes a business-like approach to the whole thing, but he's determined to change that...
